email.strStatNormal: Data Normal - there are no anomalies detected in the incoming data.
email.strStatWarning: Data Warning - the data processed yesterday falls more than 10% outside of the expected volume. Potential issue that should be checked.
email.strStatError: Data Error - the data processed yesterday falls more than 25% outside of the expected volume. There is almost certainly an issue that needs to be investigated.
